author: Jeff “Beachbum” Berry
description: Best described as a "Rum Sidecar", like the classic Sidecar  this cocktail is a tad on the sour side unless sipped through sugared rim. Altogether a better drink if you forgo the rim and add 2.5ml (half a barspoon) sugar syrup (2:1) so the balance is properly integrated.
name: Outrigger
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 3-5 years
2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
